title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Holy Family with Saint Catherine; St. John the Baptist, after Guercino; St. George and the Dragon, After Alessandro Tiarini; Two Putti", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center left: Albano Bologna; at center: Guercino Bologna; at lower left: 17/ Tiarini Bologna; at lower center: Tiarini Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description:
Upper left, Holy Family with Saint Catherine at lower left, draperies and landscape background. Upper right, half figure of St.John. Lower left, St. Michael standing atop beast and looking heavenward. Lower right, kneeling angel holding
lilies, and another standing behind him.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Holy Family with Saint Catherine; St. John the Baptist, after Guercino; St. George and the Dragon, After Alessandro Tiarini; Two Putti", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3562-a/d.
